info.title: Ilionx Pet Store API
info.description: API documentation for the Ilionx Pet Store application.

externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation

tags.name: Owner Pet
tags.description: Pet management endpoints nested under owners

get.description: Returns a single visit by its unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a visit by its unique identifier

get.description: Returns a single veterinarian by their unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a veterinarian by their unique identifier

get.description: Returns a single specialty by its unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a specialty by its unique identifier

get.description: Returns a single pet by its unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a pet by its unique identifier

get.description: Returns a single pet type by its unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a pet type by its unique identifier

get.description: Returns a single pet by owner and pet identifiers

put.description: Updates an existing pet for a specific owner

delete.description: Deletes a pet for a specific owner

get.description: Returns a single visit for a specific pet owned by a specific owner

put.description: Updates an existing visit for a specific pet owned by a specific owner

delete.description: Deletes a visit for a specific pet owned by a specific owner

get.description: Returns a single owner by their unique identifier

delete.description: Deletes a pet owner by their unique identifier

get.description: Returns a list of all visits
Returns a list of all veterinarians
Returns a list of all veterinary specialties
Returns a list of all pets
Returns a list of all pet types
Returns a list of all pet owners, optionally filtered by last name
Returns all pets belonging to a specific owner

post.description: Creates a new pet for a specific owner

get.description: Returns all visits for a specific pet owned by a specific owner

post.description: Creates a new visit for a specific pet owned by a specific owner

UpdateVisitRequest.description: Request to update an existing visit

id.description: The unique identifier of the visit

UpdateVetRequest.description: Request to update an existing vet

specialtyIds.description: List of specialty IDs to assign to the vet

id.description: The unique identifier of the specialty
The unique identifier of the vet

UpdateSpecialtyRequest.description: Request to update an existing specialty

UpdatePetRequest.description: Request to update an existing pet

id.description: The unique identifier of the pet
The unique identifier of the pet type

VisitSummaryResponse.description: Summary of a visit within a pet response

id.description: The unique identifier of the visit

UpdatePetTypeRequest.description: Request to update an existing pet type

UpdateOwnerRequest.description: Request to update an existing owner

OwnerResponse.description: Response containing owner details with their pets

id.description: The unique identifier of the owner

PetSummaryResponse.description: Summary of a pet within an owner response

id.description: The unique identifier of the pet

CreateVisitRequest.description: Request to create a new visit

CreateVetRequest.description: Request to create a new vet

specialtyIds.description: List of specialty IDs to assign to the vet

CreateSpecialtyRequest.description: Request to create a new specialty

CreatePetRequest.description: Request to create a new pet

CreatePetTypeRequest.description: Request to create a new pet type

CreateOwnerRequest.description: Request to create a new owner
